entries.title: Team Management App
entries.description: A team management app for a client managing a service-oriented fraternity and sorority.
features: Messaging center notifies users via text and email as well as in-app
Administrators can create projects and post updates
Users can be assigned tasks and receive automated reminders by text and email
Administrator can create events and track users' attendance
tech: Created with the Laravel PHP framework and Vue.js

entries.title: Portfolio (port to Vue.js)
entries.description: A port of my Portfolio site to the Vue.js front-end framework, formerly having used my own JQuery-designed SPA framework.
tech: Removed former dependencies on JQuery and Velocity.js
Hosting and maintenance on my VPS (LEMP stack running on Ubuntu)
HTTPS certificate via Let's Encrypt

entries.title: FISH Food Pantry
entries.description: A minimalistic, primarily informative site. Clients requested online donation feature via PayPal and blog-style news post authoring.
features: Responsive design targeting mobile devices and desktop computers
Secure login and user/role management for clients
Rich text editor for authoring news posts and uploading images
Paypal donation option for quick online donations
entries.notes: Site features blog-style post features and may contain user-created content and design choices.
tech: Created with the Laravel PHP framework
Post authoring system uses Quill.js WYSIWYG editor
JPG and PNG images uploaded to the server by the user are automatically resized and compressed using TinyPNG
Hosting and maintenance on my VPS (LEMP stack running on Ubuntu)
HTTPS certificate via Let's Encrypt

entries.title: Portfolio (version 1)
features: One of four random video backgorunds loaded on the splash screen
tech: Self-made SPA logic using JQuery
Dynamic content display based on URL hash
JavaScript History API used to define browser back/forward button behavior

entries.title: First United Methodist Church
entries.description: A promotional site for First United Methodist Church designed to be a 'digital poster.'
features: Front-page design based on FUMC vision statement (Open Hearts, Open Minds, Open Hands)
entries.notes: Site features custom CMS and may contain user-created content and design choices.
tech: Custom CMS, login and permissions system, and dynamic page loads written in PHP
Rich text page editor using TinyMCE
